metadata.title: CVE-2022-22895 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Jerryscript 3.0.0 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflow viaecma_utf8_string_to_number_by_radix in/jerry-core/ecma/base/ecma-helpers-conversion.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
